words.etymology_text: From Ancient Greek Θώθ (Thṓth), from Egyptian ḏḥwtj.

glosses: Thai restaurant (restaurant serving food prepared in Thai style)
Thai, Thai language, Thai speaking (written or expressed in Thai)

forms.form: Rare. Only used with substantive adjectives.

forms.form: Rare. Only used with substantive adjectives.

words.etymology_text: Internationalism (see English Thatcherism). Contains the suffix -ismi.
